text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in our hair
Laughter in the air
Waves crash on the shore
Can't ask for more

[Chorus]
Never-ending summer
Living wild and free
Never-ending summer
Just you and me

[Verse]
Dancing in the sand
Holding your hand
Stars light up the night
Everything’s alright

[Chorus]
Never-ending summer
Living wild and free
Never-ending summer
Just you and me

[Bridge]
Time stops when you're near
No place for fear
In this moment we stay
Chasing the day

[Chorus]
Never-ending summer
Living wild and free
Never-ending summer
Just you and me
title: Never-ending Summer
